definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
bucket/(trash) can/barrel (of oil etc)/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The first thing Nekhludoff saw, on entering, was a large, stinking tub.
sentences.chinese: 旅站门廊里放着一个臭烘烘的大木桶，就是“便桶”。

sentences.english: The oaf stumbled over the bucket, spilling all the water.
sentences.chinese: 那个笨手笨脚的人绊到了木桶，把水全给泼了。

sentences.english: Another expression is "as easy as shooting fish in a barrel".
sentences.chinese: 另一种表达是“像在木桶里杀鱼那样容易”。

sentences.english: A maker or repairer of barrels and tubs; a cooper.
sentences.chinese: 一个以制造或修理木桶或浴盆为业的工匠。

sentences.english: Sit back and enjoy watching this cask of Scottish whisky maturing .
sentences.chinese: 坐下来欣赏这个苏格兰威士忌成化的木桶吧。

sentences.english: The barrel began to spring  a leak.
sentences.chinese: 那个木桶开始破裂泄漏了。

sentences.english: Mix the potash well with the water. Add it to the oil in a wooden bucket.
sentences.chinese: 将碳酸钾和水充分混合，向木桶中加入脂肪。

sentences.english: The barrel was labelled flour and taken aboard the ship.
sentences.chinese: 那只木桶标明是装的面粉，被运上了船。

sentences.english: Because thy humble cottage, or thy tub.
sentences.chinese: 你的茆草棚或你的木桶。

sentences.english: They kept the ice and drinks in a big covered wooden barrel.
sentences.chinese: 他们把冰块和饮料保存在一个带盖的大木桶里。

sentences.english: The housing bends and kinks as it enters the barrel adjuster.
sentences.chinese: 住房弯和纠缠如同它进入木桶调整器。

sentences.english: Her sisters emptied their pails into the big round wooden tub.
sentences.chinese: 她的姐们们将木桶的水倒入一个巨大的圆澡盆里。

sentences.english: That moss-covered bucket I hailed as a treasure.
sentences.chinese: 那布满青苔的木桶，我那么珍惜。

sentences.english: Wine casks that have been placed will occasionally generate bottles of wine that have several useful features.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒木桶被偶尔会产生酒瓶子有几个有用的功能。

sentences.english: They sat within the door on two empty kegs.
sentences.chinese: 两个人就坐在门口的两只空木桶上。

definition: jug (earthenware with a big belly and a small opening)
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
